Hi, all. My idea for using NEAT/rtNEAT is for my honours project at
uni whe=
re I, hopefully, will be using NEAT/rtNEAT in a game. One major
idea I have=
 had though is to possibly extend NEAT to control every
aspect of a virtual=
 organism, i.e. using the neuroevolution to create
intelligent creatures, a=
nd extend the evolution to allow a visual
representation of each organism, =
where crossover and mutation would
effect the physical attributes of an org=
anism. 
Thanks 
Tom.
